MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G33 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30PM to replace electrical equipment on Calvay Crescent and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:54 PM on Sunday, 13 December 2020.
